他プラットフォームで半年遊び最近PC版も購入した感想です。
キラーもサバイバーもどちらも遊ぶことをお勧めします。
プロのようなプレイヤーも多く、自身がどちらの立場で対峙しても手も足も出ないことは多くありますが諦めずに真似するところから始まります。
対人戦オンリーなのでプレイごとに必ず試合運びが変わり、MAPも毎度ランダムなので自身の動きや役割も常時変化していきます。
つまり飽きずに長く楽しめる作品だと思います。
プレイヤー層が広いこともありどうしても煽り行為や嫌がらせ行為に合うことは少なくありませんが、そういう人々をキラーで蹂躙できる快感を楽しんでください。

É um jogo com boa premissa, embora sofra com bugs cuja quantidade é acima da média a cada atualização e que demoram um tempo considerável para serem consertados. Alguns killers precisam de rework, por serem desbalanceados, muito fracos. Skins são maneiras e a comunidade é muito difícil de lidar, recomendo jogar com o chat fechado.

This game is just all around great, and is the only one of its kind that has managed to do so much starting from so little.

Although certain things do grind my gears its just too much fun to turn away. 
I have around 400 hours on survivor and over 300 on killer and although i have my bad games and run ins with the toxic portion of the community, the good games just outweigh them by a landslide. Plus the sheer amount of perks in this game allow for you to play in literally any way whether its using only meta perks or messing around with the more underused ones, there is so many different playstyles and builds you can run that just make the game more enjoyable.

The large range and uniqueness of the abilities of the killers honestly put a smile on my face because it shows that genuine effort got put into making these killers very unique both visually and gameplay wise. And the fact that some of the most iconic horror characters are actually put in this game just enforce the true uniqueness and originality this game has. 

People shit on this game alot and they have the right to do so to an extent but I just cannot recommend it enough to anyone else due its replayability and overall fun you can have

When playing with friends everything just get multiplied by 20. Ever since i got 3 of my friends into this game again Ive probably never had more fun getting chased by a killer and getting killed from acting like an idiot. 

Although the grinding of getting perks and unlocking the characters (if you dont want to buy them that is especially the licenced ones since they can only be bought with the premium currency) may turn most people away for this game, in the long run it actually gives you somthing to work towards. 

The only main things i wish they would fix is mostly the matchmaking (but with a 4 man party its kinda redundent), balancing of certain perks/some maps, and the hitboxes but seeing as the developers are constantly reworking and changing "some" of these issues im overall satisfied with this game since day 1 and I hope it still grows and gets access to more amazing horror icons. 

Solid 9/10 

PS if you do get into DBD I highly recommend watching a youtuber/twitch streamer by the name of Otzdarva, he makes great guides and gameplay videos for both survivor and killer and is an overall nice person. Plus hes an active member of the community and is endorsed by the developers themselves! 

Please give this game a chance and remember to have fun and keep a positive attitude

The game is great, new content added isn't ruining the game. Balance will always be an issue but with this game it seems viable to run almost any perk or killer and still have a great time. The graphics have been getting better, I hope we can see some really nice textures in the future to add to the 'creepiness' to this game. Every game is different, whether you play survivor or killer. Keep going Behaviour.
EDIT: Balance Moris and Keys actually. Keys should not get multiple survivors out before the killer can react, nor should Moris put the survivors at a disadvantage by the time maybe not even 1 gen is done.
Tons of fun either by yourself or with a group of friends.

While this game takes a lot of time to learn, it is very fun, especially with friend. Be mindful of all the bugs within the game and the toxicity from certain people, but the overall community is very helpful and friendly.

Al principio me pareció que la mecánica de juego era muy repetitiva. Después de varias partidas con amigos le fui agarrando el gusto y se ha vuelto el multiplayer que siempre jugamos. Es bastante gratificante jugar como superviviente y lograr eludir al asesino. Como asesino cambia completamente el estilo de juego, el cual también es muy divertido. De sus puntos malos están los tiempos de espera, tanto para el matchmaking en partidas públicas y así como la carga inicial. También el sistema de progresión y desbloqueo de habilidades es muy lento para mi gusto. A pesar de eso si recomiendo el juego. Si lo encuentras en oferta y estas buscando algo que jugar con tus amigos, no dudes en darle una oportunidad.
